Game.Player

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Player.AbstractPlayer
      • Game.Player.User

  • public class User
extends AbstractPlayer
    User is the extension of AbstractPlayer that has an end user controlling what cards to play.

      • Fields inherited from class Game.Player.AbstractPlayer

        client, playerState

      • displayState

        private void displayState()
        Displays the active card, the active cards selected color if its a Special card, Also the players hand and what numbers are available when picking cards.

      • handleUserInput

        private void handleUserInput(java.lang.String[] inputSplit)
        Handle the users input, alter the players state depending on the card being played and check if uno has been said. Add information to transmit and send, if invalid input then replay turn.
        Parameters:
        inputSplit - The inputSplit that is to be handled.
